description: '''Roger David''' ({{langx|pa|{{nq|راجر ڈیوڈ}}}}, {{IPA|pa|ɾaːd͡ʒəɾ ɖeːʋɪɖ|pron}}; born 15 October 1979), better known by his stage name '''Bohemia''' ({{IPA|pa|boːɦiːmiːaː|pron}}), is a [[Pakistani Americans|Pakistani-American]] rapper, singer, songwriter and record producer, mainly associated with [[Punjabi music|Punjabi language music]] industry. He is considered to be one of the pioneers of the [[Desi hip hop]] industry.
